title: Arctic Weather Satellite: advancing weather forecasting in a changing climate
summary: The effects of the climate crisis are felt more acutely in the Arctic than anywhere else on the planet. The weather in the Arctic is not only severe, but it changes extremely quickly. More frequent data are urgently needed to improve weather forecasts for this susceptible polar region.

title: SpaceX launches second pair of Maxar WorldView Legion imaging satellites
summary: Maxar’s third and fourth WorldView Legion satellites launched into mid-inclination orbit

title: Lockheed Martin to acquire Terran Orbital
summary: Lockheed Martin is buying smallsat manufacturer Terran Orbital, months after the company dropped earlier plans for an acquisition.

title: China could develop dual relay satellite system for Earth-moon communications to reduce geopolitical risks
summary: HELSINKI — Chinese researchers are proposing to combine separate Earth and lunar orbit relay systems to reduce risks and uncertainty associated with relying on ground stations in other countries. China […]

title: Lockheed Martin to take struggling spacecraft manufacturer Terran Orbital private in $450 million deal
summary: Lockheed Martin is buying Terran Orbital, the company announced Thursday, with the defense giant reaching a deal to take the struggling spacecraft manufacturer private.

title: Apex offers GEO version of Aries satellite bus
summary: Satellite manufacturing startup Apex has developed a version of its Aries bus intended for geostationary orbit missions.

title: Sols 4273-4274: Prep Rally

title: Redwire to acquire satellite manufacturer Hera Systems, bolstering defense portfolio
summary: Hera Systems developed a geostationary small satellite platform selected for a U.S. Space Force in-orbit refueling experiment
